Articles.Content: False, but close. The next user has built a base on Gilly

False. I rarely play anymore.

The user below me has been playing since KSP .10

False, 0.17

User below me has made a mod for KSP

If you consider a private CFG edit a mod, then yes. (Although I do have an idea for a <CENSORED> in my head)

The person below me has not viewed the Postcards from laythe fanworks post by chobit-389. I haven't.

False. I'll give you three guesses why but you'll only need one

The user below me has no idea what PfL is

Very false, I use it as my everything background on my computer.

The next user hates Windows 8.

True, the demo version I had was incompatible with my Wacom tablet's drivers. I won't upgrade until they fix that, but otherwise Win8 seemed acceptable

The user below me has times when they miss things like internet dial tones, analogue phones, floppy disks, etc etc

Somewhat true with the fact you can make floppy disk drives sing a song.

The user below me wants go sign up for the one way trip to mars from mars one.

Maybe, maybe not.

The next user wonders if someone will ever make a spaceflight simulator game with n-body physics.

False. Orbiter

The next user have landed on Jool

False. Unless you count when Jeb decides to put on his best Slender Man impression and destroy the sky.

The user below me has had the sky in KSP vanish on them.
The user below is a fish.

False.

User below me is laughing at Cap's pic

False, the sky disappearing is a bad thing. It even caused hysteria.

The user below me has changed their icon recently (I'm looking at you, camelot)

Nope.

The person below me cuts down trees, eats his lunch, and goes to the lavatory.

Nope. I eat lunch but dats it.

The user below me has removed the muns surface with a glitch

False, But I really want to see that happen

User below me knows what happens when you let Bob drink rocket fuel

False, And I don't want to know

User below me has never made it to Eeloo.

False

The user below me has been to Moho!

True, I've been to the bottom of the great pit at it's north pole

The user below me is Scottish! *dances around in a kilt singing Scotland the Brave*

Nope, I'm American, but if you go back in my family you'll find that Germany+Italy=Me.

The user below me has driven a motorboat before.

True, but never for the whole trip (which were very short).

The user below me has some sort of mental disorder or syndrome (i.e. autism, ADHD, Asperger's).

False, or True, or False,or True, or False, or True, or False, or True, or False, or True, or False, or True, or False

The user below me is drunk

Says you.

The user below me has taken to long to get me a pizza.

False. That was someone else.

If you look at the frankenturrets in Portal 2 when GLaDOS delivers a logic bomb, they fissle.
